alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:58PM EST until December 20 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at North Creek. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, water reaches moderate flood stage. State Route 28 in North River has about half a foot of water across it. Carpenter`s Field is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 11.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River North Creek Flood Stage: 10.0 Observed Stage at Mon 12 pm: 9.5 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 9.3 Mon 7 pm 11.0 Tue 1 am 10.7 Tue 7 am 10.4 Tue 1 pm 10.4 Tue 7 pm 10.1 Wed 1 am 9.8 Wed 7 am 9.4 Wed 1 pm 8.9 Wed 7 pm 8.5 Thu 1 am 8.1 Thu 7 am 7.7 &&
